exec: // mocking variables to be copy&paste-able to widgets.js
// using MOCKED_WIDGET_CONFIGS for POSTMAN configs as well

options: "[{\"key\":\"newPageOnClick\",\"label\":\"Open new page on table row click\",\"checked\":false},{\"key\":\"showClaim\",\"label\":\"Show Claim Button\",\"checked\":true},{\"key\":\"showComplete\",\"label\":\"Show Complete Button\",\"checked\":true}]",
// THIS VARIABLE CAN BE COPIED TO widgets.js IN PDA PROJECT

item.name: 2.0. CLEANUP
item.description: Removing previously created widgets, pages, models.

body.raw:
{
    "seo": false,
    "displayedInMenu": true,
    "charset": "utf-8",
    "contentType": "text/html",
    "code": "{{DEV_PAGE_CODE}}",
    "titles": {
        "en": "DEV env page",
        "it": "DEV env page (IT)"
    },
    "parentCode": "homepage",
    "ownerGroup": "free",
    "pageModel": "{{DEV_PAGE_MODEL}}"
}

exec: // GET task-list widget config request should be run first

request.description: Tests connection and if it's working - sets {{KIE_CONNECTION}} variable.
Tests connection and if it's working - sets {{KIE_CONNECTION}} variable.
Fetches task list in the selected KIE server connection. First task on the list will be assigned to {{FIRST_TASK}} variable.
Fetches first task in the KIE server connection. GET tasks request has to be called first.
Fetches specified task on the KIE server connection. Task ID is set into TASK variable.
